steps.step1_detail: Easy to search for beauty places by services, stylists and areas
steps.step2_detail: Actively making an appointment with hair salons, nails and spas
steps.step3_detail: Enjoy professional services at your favourite places
steps.step4_detail: Send feedbacks  to salons & share your experience for other beauty lovers

explore.booking_to_enjoy_detail: Bzone is a beauty zone, where you'll find and connect with beauty salons anytime you want. Top lists of salons, spas and services are waiting for you. So why are you hesitating for? Let's join now.

footer.do_you_know_detail: By connecting with beauty salons and professional stylists in Vietnam, we hope to bring you an opportunity to express your personality in different ways. Furthermore, Bzone plays a part as a beauty community where you can connect souls to beauty and inspire everyone.

auth.easily_book: You don’t really need to have account but you can easily book an appointment!
auth.thank_for_salon_register: We have received your registration and would like to thank you a lot. Please wait our representation will contact you within 24 working hours
auth.register_salon_60s: Just 60 seconds to have a professional manage tool
auth.error_password_confirmation: Mật khẩu xác nhận không khớp
auth.we_sent_verified: We have sent a verified code to
auth.enter_the_verified_code: Please enter the verified code in the box below
auth.resend_seconds: Gửi lại mã xác nhận sau {seconds}s
auth.thank_and_wait: Thank for using Bzone's service.Please arrive 5 minutes early and check your email, SMS before you go
auth.enter_code_salon: Nhập Code để xác nhận tài khoản
auth.gift_line_1: Miễn phí quảng bá thông tin thương hiệu, cho phép người dùng tìm kiếm dễ dàng hơn
auth.gift_line_2: Miễn phí 45 ngày sử dụng Phần mềm quản lý salon - nhiều tiện ích và hiệu quả
auth.gift_line_3: Tiện lợi với việc quản lý salon trên ứng dụng trên mobile app
auth.success_info_desc:
Vui lòng hoàn thiện thông tin thương hiệu của bạn tại
Phần mềm quản lý salon - chỉ dành cho chủ salon
auth.term: Đăng ký nghĩa là bạn đồng ý với mọi điều khoản dịch vụ
